ðŸ“¦ deploy-remote
=======================

Deploy remote module

Installation
-----

```bash
pip install -i https://mirrors.aliyun.com/pypi/simple/ --extra-index-url https://pypi.org/simple/ deploy-remote
```

Example
-----

```shell
pip install deploy_remote
deploy-remote --help
```

To Do

- Be the best version of you.
